channel.title: Cannot log in using Galkon's Refactored Client
channel.description:
Whenever I try to log in to my local server, I get black screened and disconnected right after.
GIF of my issue:
http://i.imgur.com/ebBKLSY.gifv
Console error:
http://prntscr.com/7z4f3l
EDIT: Fixed. If anyone else comes across this issue, read this post from rune-server by Ambient.
[url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/354154-pi-real-way-getting-galkons-client-connect-project-insanity.html]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/354154-pi-real-way-getting-galkons-client-connect-project-insanity.html[/url]
